China appoints Dong Jun as new defence minister - state mediaChina named Dong Jun as its new defence minister on Friday to replace the last minister who disappeared four months ago. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 10:47:05 GMT IQOLC4JECRJWZGLQXCJS3QPWGY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-appoints-dong-jun-new-defence-minister-state-media-2023-12-29/Yew Lun Tian世界中国
NATO air forces scrambled over 300 times in 2023 due to Russian military aircraftNATO air forces were scrambled more than 300 times in response to Russian military aircraft in 2023, the treaty organisation said on Friday. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 10:39:30 GMT 7R6SLFP43NICTO5EYL54YV2JHE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/nato-air-forces-scrambled-over-300-times-2023-due- Russian-military-aircraft-2023-12-29/Reuters世界欧洲
Russian court sentences Navalny ally in Siberia to 9.5 years in prisonA Russian court sentenced an ally of jailed Kremlin critic Alexei Navalny on Friday to nine and a half years in prison for running an "extremist organisation", her legal team said. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 10:32:16 GMT OANPN4NNUNLQHLCIYIZIKDIWXM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-court-sentences-navalny-ally-siberia-95-years-prison-2023-12-29/Reuters世界欧洲
Kremlin says it has list of Western assets to be seized if Russian assets are confiscatedThe Kremlin on Friday warned the West that it had a list of U.S., European and other assets that would be seized if G7 leaders decided to go ahead and confiscate $300 billion in frozen Russian central bank reserves. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 10:23:33 GMT ZHRMHCFF3BM6DPKSHHC4CMSJBE https://www.reuters.com/world/kremlin-says-it-has-list-western-assets-be-seized-if- Russian-assets-are-2023-12-29/Guy Faulconbridge, Dmitry Antonov世界
Unidentified object enters Poland from direction of Ukraine, says Polish armyAn unidentified aerial object entered the airspace of NATO-member Poland from the direction of the border with Ukraine on Friday morning, the Polish army's Operational Command said. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 09:52:38 GMT ZU6BIMIIJ5MQXI4MZ6PMIAWR4I https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/unidentified-object-entered-poland-direction-ukraine-says-polish-army-2023-12-29/Reuters世界欧洲
Turkey detains 29 people with suspected Islamic State ties planning attacks, says ministerTurkish authorities have detained 29 people suspected of having ties to militant group Islamic State in operations across nine provinces, Interior Minister Ali Yerlikaya said on Friday. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 09:45:44 GMT FGXKQIUCJBMEZP4ODYZB2IURTY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkey-detains-29-people-with-suspected-islamic-state-ties-planning-attacks-says-2023-12-29/Reuters世界中东
The latest results in Congo’s disputed electionDemocratic Republic of Congo is gradually releasing preliminary results from the Dec. 20 presidential election following a chaotic vote and an unscheduled ballot extension that have led the opposition to demand a re-run. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 08:46:22 GMT PRAIKS2URRNHRPAHHUMNMP4QUM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/latest-results-congos-disputed-election-2023-12-29/Reuters世界非洲
Russia launches massive missile attack on Ukraine, 12 dead, Kyiv saysRussia on Friday unleashed one of its biggest missile attacks on Ukraine of the war so far, killing 12 civilians, wounding dozens more and hitting residential buildings in Kyiv, the south and west of the country, officials said. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 08:25:53 GMT YM2IAXF3IBIRDE2HOT4Y5HYHOY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-launches-massive-air-attack-ukraine-least-10-dead-kyiv-2023-12-29/Yuliia Dysa, Tom Balmforth世界欧洲
Two killed, 15 injured in Russian strike on Odesa - governorTwo people were killed and at least 15 were injured, including two children, as Russian missiles hit residential buildings in the southern city of Odesa, the regional governor said. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 08:00:44 GMT E6J4SPWVZFOLVBJ46LKM3EAD2Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/two-killed-15-injured-Russian-strike-odesa-governor-2023-12-29/Reuters世界欧洲
China's fireworks ban sparks fiery debate ahead of Lunar New YearChinese lawmakers on Friday weighed in on a fiery online debate on whether fireworks should be used to ring in the Lunar New Year in February, saying a total ban on pyrotechnics in the country credited with inventing them would be hard to implement. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 07:28:05 GMT 2MZP74RMNZJJ7BAXHKEIXPKLAI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-fireworks-ban-sparks-fiery-debate-ahead-lunar-new-year-2023-12-29/Reuters世界中国
Iran executes four accused of sabotage, links to Israel's MossadIran executed on Friday four people, including a woman, whom it accused of being "saboteurs" with links to Israel's Mossad intelligence service, the Mizan news agency said. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 05:14:52 GMT KNAEW7IBFVNNLBMNX6VERB53GY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-says-it-executes-four-saboteurs-linked-israels-mossad-2023-12-29/Reuters世界中东
